20101223230605.000|20101223230607.000|CC1|>> WELL, I THINK IN LIGHT OF    
20101223230607.000|20101223230613.000|CC1|WHAT HAPPENED IN EARLY NOVEMBER,
20101223230613.000|20101223230614.000|CC1|AS YOU RECALL AND WE BOTH KNOW, 
20101223230614.000|20101223230615.000|CC1|OUR PARTY OR MY PARTIEN I ASSUME

20101223230626.000|20101223230628.000|CC1|WE ENJOYED A NEW TAX CUT, A     
20101223230628.000|20101223230629.000|CC1|PAYROLL TAX CUT AND A 13-MONTH  
20101223230629.000|20101223230631.000|CC1|EXTENSION, AS YOU KNOW, FOR     
20101223230631.000|20101223230632.000|CC1|UNEMPLOYMENT BENEFITS.          
20101223230632.000|20101223230634.000|CC1|IN ADDITION, THE CUTS THAT THE  
20101223230634.000|20101223230637.000|CC1|PRESIDENT WANTED AROUND,

20101223230638.000|20101223230640.000|CC1|BREAKS, ALL WILL HOPEFULLY      
20101223230640.000|20101223230641.000|CC1|STIMULATE JOB CREATION AND

20101223230644.000|20101223230646.000|CC1|SOME SORT OF STABILITY IN THE   
20101223230646.000|20101223230647.000|CC1|SENSE OF CERTAINTY.

20101223230650.000|20101223230650.000|CC1|ONE.
